text: Two Little Imps is a 1917 American silent comedy film directed by Kenean Buel and starring Jane Lee, Katherine Lee and Leslie Austin. ==Cast== * Jane Lee as Jane * Katherine Lee as Katherine * Leslie Austin as Billy Parke * Edna Hunter as Betty Murray * Edwin Holt as William Murray * Stuart Sage as Bob Murray * Sidney D'Albrook as Burglar * William Harvey as His Pal ==References== ==External links== * Category:1917 films Category:1917 drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American drama films Category:American black- and-white films Category:Films directed by Kenean Buel Category:Fox Film films
title: Two Little Imps
